name: Gardevoir
author: TOKIYA
flavor_text: It has the power to predict the future. Its power peaks when it is protecting its Trainer.

abilities.name: Bright Heal
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Telekinesis
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Weakness or Resistance.
